entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Shamattawa
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:16 AM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 45 this morning and minus 30 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 24 with temperature rising to minus 20 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24 with temperature rising to minus 20 by morning. Wind chill minus 32 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then mainly cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 37 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 36. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 16 February 2023
